languages.text: "Знаю, что ты не питаешь ко мне доверия, Ульфар, но даю слово — информация о том, как пала твоя стая, не будет оглашена. Ваши секреты будут в безопасности".
"I know you have no trust in me, Ulfar, but I give you my word — the information about how your pack fell will not be made public. Your secrets will be safe."
languages.original_text: "Знаю, что ты не питаешь ко мне доверия, Ульфар, но даю слово — информация о том, как пала твоя стая, не будет оглашена. Ваши секреты будут в безопасности".

traits.locale_text: "I know you have no trust in me, Ulfar, but I give you my word — the information about how your pack fell will not be made public. Your secrets will be safe."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I know you have no trust in me, Ulfar, but I give you my word — the information about how your pack fell will not be made public. Your secrets will be safe."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I know you have no trust in me, Ulfar, but I give you my word — the information about how your pack fell will not be made public. Your secrets will be safe."

traits.locale_text: "I know you have no trust in me, Ulfar, but I give you my word — the information about how your pack fell will not be made public. Your secrets will be safe."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我知道你不信任我，乌尔法，但我向你保证，你的狼群是如何倒下的，这些事情永远都不会公开。永远都不会有人知道你的秘密。”
languages.original_text: "I know you have no trust in me, Ulfar, but I give you my word — the information about how your pack fell will not be made public. Your secrets will be safe."

traits.locale_text: “我知道你不信任我，乌尔法，但我向你保证，你的狼群是如何倒下的，这些事情永远都不会公开。永远都不会有人知道你的秘密。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Je sais que vous ne me faites pas confiance, Ulfar, mais je vous donne ma parole que l'information concernant ce qu'il est advenu de votre meute ne sera jamais rendue publique. Vos secrets sont bien gardés. »
languages.original_text: "I know you have no trust in me, Ulfar, but I give you my word — the information about how your pack fell will not be made public. Your secrets will be safe."

traits.locale_text: « Je sais que vous ne me faites pas confiance, Ulfar, mais je vous donne ma parole que l'information concernant ce qu'il est advenu de votre meute ne sera jamais rendue publique. Vos secrets sont bien gardés. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Sé que no confía en mí, Ulfar, pero le doy mi palabra. La información sobre la caída de su jauría no saldrá a la luz. Sus secretos están a salvo conmigo».
languages.original_text: "I know you have no trust in me, Ulfar, but I give you my word — the information about how your pack fell will not be made public. Your secrets will be safe."

traits.locale_text: «Sé que no confía en mí, Ulfar, pero le doy mi palabra. La información sobre la caída de su jauría no saldrá a la luz. Sus secretos están a salvo conmigo».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「俺を信用していないのはわかるが、ウルファー、約束しよう。お前の群れがどのように負けたのか、その詳細情報は明かさない。秘密は守られる」
languages.original_text: "I know you have no trust in me, Ulfar, but I give you my word — the information about how your pack fell will not be made public. Your secrets will be safe."

traits.locale_text: 「俺を信用していないのはわかるが、ウルファー、約束しよう。お前の群れがどのように負けたのか、その詳細情報は明かさない。秘密は守られる」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich weiß, Ihr vertraut mir nicht, Ulfar, doch ich gebe Euch mein Wort: Niemand wird davon erfahren, wie Euer Rudel gefallen ist. Eure Geheimnisse sind bei mir sicher."
languages.original_text: "I know you have no trust in me, Ulfar, but I give you my word — the information about how your pack fell will not be made public. Your secrets will be safe."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß, Ihr vertraut mir nicht, Ulfar, doch ich gebe Euch mein Wort: Niemand wird davon erfahren, wie Euer Rudel gefallen ist. Eure Geheimnisse sind bei mir sicher."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "I know you have no trust in me, Ulfar, but I give you my word — the information about how your pack fell will not be made public. Your secrets will be safe."

languages.text: "Bana güvenmediğini biliyorum Ulfar ama sana söz veriyorum. Sürünün düşüşü hakkındaki hakikat kulaktan kulağa yayılmayacak. Sırların güvende olacak."
languages.original_text: "I know you have no trust in me, Ulfar, but I give you my word — the information about how your pack fell will not be made public. Your secrets will be safe."

traits.locale_text: "Bana güvenmediğini biliyorum Ulfar ama sana söz veriyorum. Sürünün düşüşü hakkındaki hakikat kulaktan kulağa yayılmayacak. Sırların güvende olacak."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
